snippet.title: Slenderclown Chapter 1
snippet.description:
Play Online: http://danygames.com/play/action/slenderclown-be-afraid-of-it.html

Android Download - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.PoisonGames.SlenderclownChapter1

PC Download - https://gamejolt.com/games/slenderclown/289796

Slenderman masked himself as a Clown and he has some Scary Clown friends with him.
You need to fight them! No RUNNING AWAY!

Find 9 Red Balloons, defeat Slenderclown and his Evil Clown friends!

*Features*

- High quality 3D environment graphics
- Horrifying full 3D Slenderman and his Scary Evil Clown Friends!
- Intuitive controls
- Good knows Poison Games Gameplay.

- New Slenderman Story and new look!
- Explore The Abandoned Carnival
- Powerful Weapons - M1911 and Shotgun
- Flashlight for melee attack and lightning
